article_title: North Korea gives pastor hard labor for life
article_text: North Korea's highest court sentences Canadian pastor Hyeon Soo Lim to a life of hard labor. The court says Lim, who was born in South Korea, colluded with Seoul and the U.S. to bring down the regime in the North. James Person explains why Pyongyang is cracking down on religious workers.
